data.title: Return to Silent Hill Release Date Rumors: When is It Coming Out?
data.meta_description: Return to Silent Hill is an upcoming psychological horror film and the third entry in the Silent Hill film series after 2006’s Silent Hill and 2012’s Silent Hill: Revelation. Christophe Gans, who made the first film, directed the third one as well and developed the screenplay with Sandra Vo-Anh and Will Schneider from the Silent […] The post Return to Silent Hill Release Date Rumors: When is It Coming Out? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
data.text:
Return to Silent Hill is an upcoming psychological horror film and the third entry in the Silent Hill film series after 2006’s Silent Hill and 2012’s Silent Hill: Revelation. Christophe Gans, who made the first film, directed the third one as well and developed the screenplay with Sandra Vo-Anh and Will Schneider from the Silent Hill 2 video game by Konami. The plot revolves around James Sunderland as he returns to the town of Silent Hill in search of his soulmate and once more encounters horrifying figures. If you are wondering when Return to Silent Hil is coming out, here is everything you need to know.

Here’s all the Return to Silent Hill release date information we know so far, and all the details on when it is coming out.

Is there a Return to Silent Hill release date?

Return to Silent Hill could arrive by early 2024.

In January 2020, Gans revealed during an interview with the French magazine Allocine that he and producer Victor Hadida were developing a script based on the Silent Hill and Fatal Frame series. In June 2022, he elaborated that the upcoming film would be a reboot.

“The script for a new Silent Hill film…is completely independent [of] the two previous films made and…respects the way Silent Hill has evolved,” the director told Jeux Video. “Most of the time, they are standalone stories. Silent Hill is a bit like the Twilight Zone, the Fourth Dimension, a place where anything and everything can happen.”

Filming began in April 2023 in German cities Munich, Penzing, Nuremberg, and Lake Ammer and concluded in July 2023. IMDb reportedly mentioned that the film’s release date was April 26, 2024, but the said date has since been replaced with a blanket 2024 release date prediction. This likely means one of two things – The announcement was incorrect, and the film will be released on some other date, or it was revealed earlier than intended. Either way, especially given that the filming was wrapped in July, it is safe to speculate that Return to Silent Hill will come out in early 2024.

This date is an estimation based on the information we have at the time of this writing.

The cast includes Jeremy Irvine as James Sunderland, Eve Macklin as Kaitlyn, Alana Maria as Mitzy, Emily Carding as Dara, Lara Duru as Meyers twin 1, Karya Duru as Meyers twin 2, and more. Hannah Emily Anderson is slated to appear in the film in an undisclosed role.

Where is Return to Silent Hill coming out?

Return to Silent Hill is anticipated to come out in theaters in early 2024. ComingSoon will provide an update when the release date is officially announced.

The official synopsis for Return to Silent Hill reads:

“When a mysterious letter calls him back to Silent Hill in search of his lost love, James finds a once-recognizable town and encounters terrifying figures both familiar and new, and begins to question his own sanity.”
